1.title: Pilot

episode of.title: Behzat Ç.: Bir Ankara Polisiyesi (TV Series 2010–2013)

1.plot: A young woman falls from a bar's upstairs terrace and a suicide note is found, but a pregnancy test and links to a political group suggest foul play.

2.title: 2. Bölüm

episode of.title: Behzat Ç.: Bir Ankara Polisiyesi (TV Series 2010–2013)

2.plot: Behzat runs into an old flame in a psych ward. A child's body found with both kidneys removed prompts suspicions of criminal organ trafficking.

3.title: Gerçegin Pesinde

episode of.title: Behzat Ç.: Bir Ankara Polisiyesi (TV Series 2010–2013)

3.plot: When an ex-con who killed a woman in a robbery is murdered shortly after his release, Behzat suspects a former cop did it to avenge his wife's death.

4.title: Görünenin Ardindaki Sir

episode of.title: Behzat Ç.: Bir Ankara Polisiyesi (TV Series 2010–2013)

4.plot: The stabbing deaths of a fencing teacher and his elderly neighbor cast suspicion on an alleged gold digger, an estranged wife, her lover and others.

5.title: Kayip Yasamlar

episode of.title: Behzat Ç.: Bir Ankara Polisiyesi (TV Series 2010–2013)

5.plot: A financial adviser is killed in a parking garage getting in a car he bought for his son's birthday. Was the car's previous owner the intended target?

6.title: Gecenin Gizledikleri

episode of.title: Behzat Ç.: Bir Ankara Polisiyesi (TV Series 2010–2013)

6.plot: After receiving an insistent warning from a fan, a rising nightclub singer is strangled while sleeping over at friend Gönül's home.

7.title: Kapanmayan Yaralar

episode of.title: Behzat Ç.: Bir Ankara Polisiyesi (TV Series 2010–2013)

7.plot: When a young woman is found raped and murdered in her home, the police try to work out why the killer left out-of-circulation banknotes on her body.

8.title: Geçmisin Gölgesi

episode of.title: Behzat Ç.: Bir Ankara Polisiyesi (TV Series 2010–2013)

8.plot: When the police question a young woman who reported her identical twin sister's murder, they discover a world of difference between the two siblings.

9.title: Taban Girmek

episode of.title: Behzat Ç.: Bir Ankara Polisiyesi (TV Series 2010–2013)

9.plot: A soccer star is found cuffed to a bed and killed by a blow to the chest, casting suspicion on his jealous girlfriend, his shady manager and others.

10.title: Karanlik Koridorlar

episode of.title: Behzat Ç.: Bir Ankara Polisiyesi (TV Series 2010–2013)

10.plot: When a man accused of illegal magazine distribution dies in police custody, Behzat must lead a touchy investigation that could impact his colleagues.

11.title: Cevapsiz Sorular

episode of.title: Behzat Ç.: Bir Ankara Polisiyesi (TV Series 2010–2013)

11.plot: Photos found on Facebook and in a home identify suspects in the murder of a college student found on a roadside, and reveal a personal link to Behzat.

12.title: Geride Kalanlar

episode of.title: Behzat Ç.: Bir Ankara Polisiyesi (TV Series 2010–2013)

12.plot: Sitting on the rooftop terrace from which his daughter fell to her death, Behzat notices something that could possibly provide the answers he seeks.

13.title: Yarim Kalmis Hesaplar

episode of.title: Behzat Ç.: Bir Ankara Polisiyesi (TV Series 2010–2013)

13.plot: Behzat finds himself in a race against time to save his brother from a revenge-seeking kidnapper who has a personal connection to a recent case.

14.title: Tehlikeli Iliskiler

episode of.title: Behzat Ç.: Bir Ankara Polisiyesi (TV Series 2010–2013)

14.plot: Behzat's last conversation with his brother's kidnapper leads the detective on a hunt for evidence that will expose the undersecretary's wife.

15.title: Karanlikta kalanlar

episode of.title: Behzat Ç.: Bir Ankara Polisiyesi (TV Series 2010–2013)

15.plot: When an ad agency owner is found murdered in her hotel room, suspects include her angry ex-husband and a model she fired over a fashion show mishap.

16.title: Güvercin Tedirginligi

episode of.title: Behzat Ç.: Bir Ankara Polisiyesi (TV Series 2010–2013)

16.plot: The fatal shooting of a professor studying the problems of Turkish minorities gives rise to speculation that his murder was politically motivated.

17.title: Diken Üstünde

episode of.title: Behzat Ç.: Bir Ankara Polisiyesi (TV Series 2010–2013)

17.plot: When Feride unexpectedly goes to the police to make a confession, Behzat and his men fear their part in the matter will be discovered.

18.title: Kayip Zamanlar

episode of.title: Behzat Ç.: Bir Ankara Polisiyesi (TV Series 2010–2013)

18.plot: A second killing during the investigation of a toy shop owner's murder leads Behzat's team to a decade-old case that links the two victims.

19.title: Hesaplasma

episode of.title: Behzat Ç.: Bir Ankara Polisiyesi (TV Series 2010–2013)

19.plot: When Ercüment returns to Ankara to discuss his agreement with the undersecretary and a murder soon follows, Behzat sets out to prove he's the killer.

20.title: Küçük Balik Büyük Balik

episode of.title: Behzat Ç.: Bir Ankara Polisiyesi (TV Series 2010–2013)

20.plot: Feride gives her testimony in court. Behzat's continued pursuit of Ercüment takes him and his team from Ankara's streets to Istanbul's.

30.title: Iz Birakanlar Unutulmaz

episode of.title: Behzat Ç.: Bir Ankara Polisiyesi (TV Series 2010–2013)

30.plot: A retired Colonel named Can Uçar is found dead in his house. It seemed that the colonel shot himself in a ceremonial suicide. But the Murder Squad believes that the colonel was murdered and the suicide faked. Chief Constable asks Behzat Ç to investigate. Behzat Ç. finds that Colonel was interviewed by a reporter and he tries to find her. One the girl is located he realises that Can Uçar's murder was just the tip of the iceberg. Behzat ç. gets critical information from reporter which puts his life in danger.

imdb.plot outline: Centered around a personally troubled, officially discredited police chief and his inharmonious police team in Ankara Police Force. Even though the show usually focuses on murders and other crimes that happens on a weekly basis, the undertone of the story leads to an eventual duel between Behzat Ç. and the rotten department officials and bureaucrats.
imdb.title: Behzat Ç.: Bir Ankara Polisiyesi
plot: Centered around a personally troubled, officially discredited police chief and his inharmonious police team in Ankara Police Force. Even though the show usually focuses on murders and other crimes that happens on a weekly basis, the undertone of the story leads to an eventual duel between Behzat Ç. and the rotten department officials and bureaucrats.::ahmetkozan

Derived from the Turkish writer Emrah Serbes's novels "Behzat Ç: Her Temas Iz Birakir" (2006) and "Behzat Ç: Son Hafriyat" (2010), the series tell the story of Chief Inspector Behzat Ç, leading the Homicide and Vice divisions of the Ankara Police Force. Struggling with a failed marriage, a dark past, a rebellious daughter and corrupt bureaucrats and police officers, Behzat Ç disregards procedure, political correctness and etiquette to pursue and arrest serial killers, hitmen and violent criminals. His underlings from the Homicide and Vice desk aid and assist him in this struggle: the hot tempered, headstrong Harun, the streetwise Hayalet (the "Ghost"), the self-trained forensics expert Akbaba (the "Vulture"), the naive and green Cevdet, and Selim and Eda, who try to maintain a healthy relationship amongst the toil and trouble of dealing with murder every day. Behzat's brother, Sevket Ç, who administers a shopping mall, also occasionally throws in help. Each episode deals with a different murder, while the main plot thickens after the main villain, Ercüment Çözer, a sadistic serial killer holding many bureaucrats on his payroll, along with his tireless assistant Memduh Basgan, a shady ex-Gladio hitman are introduced. Almost all episodes take place in Ankara, Turkey.::thebuckler
